narrative.text: Brooklyn Boulevard Alp is a Custodial Care Facility, Adult Care Home provider based in Brooklyn, NY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $80.2M in Medicaid payments across 429K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
